meanings.definition: Producing a desired outcome or effect.
meanings.sent1: The resultful experiment led to a new discovery.
meanings.sent2: Her hard work had a resultful impact on the project.
meanings.sent3: The resultful recipe made everyone ask for seconds.
meanings.sent4: His resultful strategy turned the game around.
meanings.sent5: The resultful solution solved the problem instantly.

meanings.definition: Having a successful or beneficial result.
meanings.sent1: The resultful meeting boosted team morale.
meanings.sent2: Their resultful collaboration led to a successful product launch.
meanings.sent3: The resultful surprise party left her speechless.
meanings.sent4: The resultful investment doubled their profits.
meanings.sent5: The resultful decision brought them closer together.
